mapper.insert: insert into ticketorder(ticketorderid, userid, tickettypeid, quantity, orderdate) values(#{ticketorderid}, #{userid}, #{tickettype}, #{quantity}, now())
mapper.select: select userid, ticketorderid, orderdate, tickettypename, price, quantity, price * quantity as totalprice from ticketorder tto, tickettype ttn where tto.tickettypeid = ttn.tickettypeid and userid = #{userid} order by orderdate desc limit #{start}, #{count}

select ticketorderid, orderdate, tickettypename , price, quantity, price * quantity as totalprice from ticketorder tto, tickettype ttn where tto.tickettypeid = ttn.tickettypeid and userid = #{userid} and orderdate between #{startDate} and #{endDate} order by orderdate desc limit #{start}, #{count}
select count(*) from ticketorder tto, tickettype ttn where tto.tickettypeid = ttn.tickettypeid and userid = #{userid} and orderdate between #{startDate} and #{endDate}
select count(*) from ticketorder where userid = #{userid}
